3_1AqXhGEgfmdaUUsvNp3GL9pueqqLbHMkXp.body:
It is inevitable to run some Turing-complete language since **clients as servers**.
JavaScript is excellently sandboxed by Firefox, Python or others are not.
Or you just want some static files.
